name: Dark Forest Project
description:
The military was sent to investigate in the dark forest because of the frequent loss of people. How many days can he hold out before the rescue team arrives for him? And will it arrive at all?

- You need to stay alive as long as possible;
- Collect all the weapons that will help you survive.

You need to avoid zombies and shoot back from them, using various weapons and ammunition that you can buy in stores. For each zombie killed, money is given. First-aid kits that can be found in the forest will help to increase the level of health.
